data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɠizɛ naa zu, nii seeliai gi ma.
Gá-yooi vea taɠiligaani zea,
Gi ɠɛa ga podointi, kɛɛɠɛ la gi ʋɛ,
Gá ɠɛɛna gá-ɗɛi ɓɔlea, kɛni gi geya ga walii,
Gi nimiza nuiti ta gi ʋolu,
Gi yeezeini Ezipete yooi ʋɛ,
Gi-ɠɛɛni ti kotoi ɠɛɛni, kɛlɛ ti la mɔ ná,
Duɔiti ta zeini gi unda,
Nii a kɛ gi daamianigi zɔlɔɔ, gi-un ka ɠɛɛzu é yɛ su,
Gi-ɠɔlɔgi ɗa ɠala eɠɛ gá ɠɛ fuulu zu,
Ti anzanuiti koloɠoloni Siyɔn,
Ti kundiɠiiti kpadɔni gului ma ga ti-yeeiti,
Nu niinɛiti ti ɠɛni ani ziɠa ɠɔtui zeɠezu,
Kɛwolaiti ti looɠoga unpilɛ faiti ba,
Koozunɛ la mɔ gi-yiimaʋɛ.
Lɛbiya wɔɔlɔgi ɠulaa gi unba.
Ungo, ni gi-yii ɠa ɓɔlɔzu,
naa lɔɔzeiʋɛ Siyɔn ɠoloɠolo fai ʋa,
Kɛlɛ ɗɔun ɗa, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa masadai ɠɛɛzu eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Leeni vaa zu ɗa yeema gi ma eyɛsu ɠɔ?
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gi ɠaaɠale ma è ʋɔ pelei, gá ɠale ma!
Ɗa gi ʋili ya nɛi gaamazu ga ɠite ɓaa?
